title: Her Alpha Wolf
description: Gwen Daly, an innocent paralegal, was going about her workday when trouble came strolling in under the guise of humanity. When that trouble transforms into two huge, monstrous beasts who waste no time murdering her boss, Gwen runs straight into the arms of Alpha wolf, Simon Walker.  With the help of the Alpha and his ghost sister, the trouble chasing Gwen has to be stopped before Gwen joins her boss in death...  This erotic romance novella is approximately 26,000 words and is intended for mature audiences only. While it does contain a paranormal element, the paranormal aspect is actually very light. Content also includes age play to include diapering, domestic discipline, bdsm, virgin first time sex, and an alpha male who intends to get his way. If such content is offensive to you, please do not buy or borrow this book.
author: Regina Shiderly
